title: Correction: 787 Dreamliner
text:
Boeing has production challenges on the 787 Dreamliner. An article on January 12 wrongly designated the aircraft as the 737 Dreamliner.

Source: 2022 'Correction: 787 Dreamliner' FT.com 12 January. Used under licence from the Financial Times. Â© The Financial Times Limited 2022. All Rights Reserved.
